messages.title: Building a Brighter Future for Epsom, Ewell, Ashtead, Nork and Tattenhams
messages.content: Ever since the 2016 referendum, Steve has been fighting to reverse the decision and Stop Brexit.
Steve cares passionately about his children’s future. He says 'I want us to be an open and tolerant country, where we can work, travel and trade freely with our neighbors in Europe.'

'This election is the most important in my lifetime. It is time to stand up and be counted, for Remainers to be as passionate as any Brexiteer. 'Together, we can Stop Brexit.' Far too many people find that hard work no longer guarantees a happy, fulfilling and secure life for them and their children.
Labour and the Conservatives are both stuck in the past. They have failed time and again to deliver a brighter future.
Only a Liberal Democrat majority government will MAKE IT STOP by revoking Article 50.
Any 'deal' can only be the start, with years of Trade talks ahead, more uncertainty and economic stagnation.
Let's get the Remain Bonus now and free up £50 billion to spend on key services.
The Lib Dems will protect the NHS, reverse schools cuts and revive tired high streets.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Revoke Article 50 to keep the UK in the European Union.
Free up £50 billion to spend on key services from remaining in the EU.
Pledge to protect and fund the NHS adequately.
Invest in schools and undo funding cuts.
Implement policies to rejuvenate and support local high streets.
